description: This file defines the NotesProvider class, a ChangeNotifier-based provider managing the state and CRUD operations for notes within a Flutter application. It interacts with a note repository to fetch, create, update, and delete notes, and provides search/filter functionality.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier that manages the state of notes, including CRUD operations, search filtering, and loading state.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the provider by loading notes from the repository.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes the list of notes from the repository and updates loading state.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query string and notifies listeners for filtered view.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note with given title and content, inserts it into local list, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note with new title and content, updates local list, and sorts notes by updatedAtMillis.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID from the repository and updates local list.
